Features.EasyPanning.SecondsPerLayer.Des: The time, in seconds, it takes to pan one layer of material.
Features.EasyPanning.DropsPerLayer.Descr: The number of drops spawned per layer of material.
The saturation lost when panning a single layer of material.
Features.EasyPanning.ModMenu.lblDescript: Provides an easier way for players to pan resources.
Features.EasyPanning.ModMenu.lblSecondsP: Determines the number of seconds per layer when panning
Features.EasyPanning.ModMenu.lblDropsPer: Determines the number of drops per layer when panning
Features.EasyPanning.ModMenu.lblSaturati: Determines the saturation per layer when panning
